[인사] 산업통상자원부 외
05 Nov 2019, 18:33 by 조선일보
입력 2019.11.06 03:33 ▲산업통상자원부◇국장급 전보▷지역경제정책관 김용채▷경제자유구역기획단장 안성일◇과장급 전보▷규제개혁법무담당관 강경택▲보건복지부◇국장급〈승진〉▷방역정책국장 김대균▷농림축산검역본부 영남지역본부장 박성우〈전보〉▷보건산업정책국 해외의료사업지원관 임을기◇과장급〈승진〉▷구제역방역과장 이제용〈전보〉▷식품산업정책과장 이시혜▲한국투자공사〈1급〉◇승진▷대체투자실장 정수용▲과학기술정책연구원(STEPI)▷부원장 송치웅◇연구본부장▷혁신시스템 양승우▷글로벌혁신전략 김왕동◇실장▷전략기획 박찬수◇연구단장▷신산업전략 최종화▷혁신기업 김승현▷다자협력 박환일▷개발협력 선인경◇팀장▷연구관리 전대관▷대외협력 김은주▷연구부서지원 한미영▲전자부품연구원◇연구센터장▷ICT디바이스·패키징 안광호▷디스플레이 한철종▷융복합전자소재 유찬세▷나노융합 이경일▷스마트센서 차철웅▷지능로보틱스 황정훈▲건양대◇교원 보직▷학생처장 서용완◇직원 보직▷학생복지팀장 겸 정보통신원 팀장 민재홍▷학생복지팀 파트장 김동영▷입학홍보팀 파트장 김동우▲창원대▷재무과장 정필정▷입학관리과장 신용균▷산학협력단 산학기획실장 김형환▷기획평가과장 성진우▷비서실장 박정하 좋아요 0 Copyright ⓒ 조선일보 & Chosun.com 제휴안내구독신청

[Human Resources] Ministry of Trade, Industry and Energy
05 Nov 2019, 18:33 by Chosun Daily
2018.11.06 03:33 ▲ Ministry of Trade, Industry and Energy ◇ Director-level Telegram ▷ Regional Economic Policy Officer Kim Yong-chae ▷ Director of Free Economic Zone Planning Division Ahn Sung-il ◇ Director-level Telegram ▷ Regulatory Reform Act Minister Kang Kyung-taek ▲ Ministry of Health and Welfare ◇ Director-level 〈Promotion〉 ▷ Director of Defense Policy Kim Dae-gyun ▷ Agriculture and forestry Head of Yeongnam Regional Headquarters, Livestock Quarantine Division Park Sung-woo, <Telegram> ▷ Director of Overseas Medical Projects, Korea Health Industry Policy Bureau Promotion ▷ Director of Alternative Investments Jeong-Yong Jeong ▲ Research and Development Policy (STEPI) ▷ Deputy Director Song Chi-woong ◇ Director of Research Division ▷ Innovation System Yang Seung-woo ▷ Global Innovation Strategy Kim Wang-dong ◇ Director ▷ Strategic Planning Park Chan-soo ◇ Director of Research ▷ New Industrial Strategy Finalization ▷ Innovative Company Kim Seung-hyun ▷ Multilateral Cooperation Park Hwan-il ▷ Development Partnership Sun Kyung-kyung ◇ Team Leader ▷ R & D Center for Foreign Studies ▷ External Cooperation Eun-Joo Kim Center Director ▷ ICT Device / Packaging Ahn Kwang-ho ▷ Display Han Chul-jong ▷ Convergence Electronics Materials Yoo Chan-se ▷ Nano Convergence Lee Kyung-il ▷ Smart Sensor Cha Chul-woong ▷ Intelligent Robotics Hwang Jung-hoon ▲ Konyang University ◇ Faculty Staff ▷ Student Director Seo Yong-wan ◇ Staff Assistant Staff Jae-Hong Min, Head of Student Welfare Team, Dong-Young Kim, Head of Admission and Public Relations Team, Dong-Woo Kim, Chang-Won University, Chief Financial Officer, Jeong-Pil Jeong, Admission Management Division, Credit Kyun, Industry-Academic Cooperation Group Subscribe
